casebody.data:
Elizabeth J. Haynes, Respondent v. Elizabeth W. Aldrich, Appellant. Decided June 1, 1891. Appeal from judgment entered on verdict directed by the trial judge in favor of *590plaintiff. Spencer Aldrich, for appellant. Olin, Rives & Montgomery, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and McAdam, J.

Per Curiam.

The judgment herein will be affirmed, with costs.
